titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Parliament of England, for maintaining the fundamental laws of this nation.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Edward Husband, printer to the Honorable House of Commons,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: D² . Also issued as part of a through-paged set with a table for the entire set added.
Last word of first line of text: "Eng-"; first word of line below initial: "preservation"; last word of last full line on first page: "Ju-".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
